column5: there was a death on the railway line in Russey Doch village
column8: Takeo province.------The victim was Chhil Ron
column10: a farmer living in Ang Keo village
column14: the victim was walking on the railway at the southern point of the entrance to Ang Keo pagoda. A train traveling from south to north hit the victim
column15: who died at the scene. The unidentified train driver continued to drive away and the body was handed over to his family for traditional rites. ------POST NEWS
